title: Tstars Best Dad Ever Daddy is My Superhero Youth & Toddler Kids Father's Day Shirt
features: Fathers day toddler and youth kids t-shirt; I have the best dad ever. Nice casual wear wear to show off your love for dad
Gift idea for Father's day, Birthday, Christmas or any occasion; makes a nice present for dad from son or daughter or a present for husband from wife. A thoughtful way to celebrate this special day
Feature: quality basic wear printed garment; Comfort style made of friendly material, soft, comfortable and breathable.Casual and standard fit ideal for hot or cold seasons

Print and designs: quality graphic apparel, durable to endure regular wear and frequent washings. This solid color garment is decorated with a front print, using direct to garment or screen printing, cured properly so it sets into the garment. Available in a great range of colors. Designed and printed locally in USA

Fit and sizing: we recommend referring to the size chart in the photo gallery so that you can choose the most suitable size. Choose color from the drop-down list. Wash cold before wearing. Non-chlorine bleach, when needed. We recommend tumble dry, medium heat. Do not iron the decoration
description: 100% preshrunk cotton, Heather colors, Graphite Heather, Safety colors & Neon colors are 50/50 cotton/polyester, Sport Grey is 90/10 cotton/polyester, Ash Grey is 99/1 cotton/polyester, Classic fit, 3/4" double-needle topstitched collar, Taped neck and shoulders, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hems.
